ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 | 1 | #P_cldss | |- ( x e. ( Clsd ` J ) -> x C_ X ) |

| 5 | 4 | #P_ssriv | |- ( Clsd ` J ) C_ ~P X |
